title.jp: Ryubi: Going On a Journey Once More

synopsis: In appreciation of Ryubi San helping protect the town, the village elders give her the Dragon Sword to use on her future adventures. Later, Ryubi San grows self conscious about her weight and tries everything to drop some pounds.

While on their journey to collect the three ingredients to cure General Kashin from turning into a cat, the girls learn that Chojo is systematically trying to take over the capital by eliminating her competition.

As Ryomo is guarding Sonken-Sama from sunset to sunrise she over hears Sonken-Sama studying in her room. Sonken-Sama realizes that Ryomo is interested in studying and decides to teach her as practice.

title.jp: Gien Falls in Love at First Sight

synopsis: The girls learn from a traveling merchant that the court in the capital Rakuyou is in completely under the control of Totaku and the government there is now very oppressive.

title.jp: Shonshoko Attempts to Fulfill Her Destiny

synopsis: Kan'u revisits Enjutsu and sees that it is much livelier than the last time she was there. She gets a key chain present for RinRin and runs into Shoko-dono when she learns Shoko-dono is on a mission to deliver a scroll that may end a disagreement.
Ryuubi and the girls are headed through the mountain. While on their trek, Gien discovers that they are being followed by a group of assassins led by Gotsutotsukotsu who has a bone to pick with Gien.

title.jp: Kogai Makes a Plan to Deceive Her Enemies

synopsis: Kogai-dono pretends to over indulge in a rare alcohol in order to trick Shuyu into getting trapped in the store room with Saku-dono to force them to get along.

title.jp: Mokaku Is Captured and Released Many Times

synopsis: The girls come across a Nanban elephant named Paya Paya as it ran away from King Mokaku. As they return Paya paya to the King, a misunderstanding ensues when they ask if they can have some Nanban elephant belly button lint.
With the ingredients collected, the girls return back home to have the doctor make the medicine that will reverse the effects of the Nyan poison that was given to Kashin-san.

title.jp: Amane Hiroshi Can Sneak Into the Palace

synopsis: The girls band together to try and figure out a way to sneak into Rakuyou palace.
Even though Choryo's General declares the war a loss, Choryo does not wish to surrender without a fight.

title.jp: The Allied Forces Strike at Ukitsu

synopsis: Ryubi's Dragon sword may be the only weapon that can destroy the evil that possesses the clay army. Will Ryubi be able to make it deep within the enemy forces to cause major carnage?
